item.title: erlang有用的小细节
item.description:
#####1. erlang shell用法

rp(Term)

Prints a term using the record definitions known to the shell. All of Term is printed; the depth is not limited as is the case when a return value is printed.
成员节点启动参数

Shard:

mongod --shardsvr
mongod --shardsvr --rpelSet (副本集)

Config server:

mongod --configsvr

Mongos

mongos --configdb <configdb server>

分片步骤

> use admin
> sh.addShard("ip:port")
> db.runCommand({enablesharding:"db"})
> db.runCommand({"shardcollection":"db.collection",key:{"key":1}})

查看shard成员

> use config
> db.shards.find()

查看shard状态

> db.printShardingStatus()
